string.value: You find Manji in Perion, but he is unwilling to give you any #bArcon's blood#k for free. He wants you to go to the underground tunnel in the middle of the island and gather up #b40 Charms of the Undead#k first. Who does he think he is, treating you so coldly?! You almost regret agreeing to help Maya, but it seems like no one else is willing to...
Manji asked for Charms of the Undead in return for some Arcon's Blood.

So you want to acquire some #b#t4031005##k? Hah...that's not for a nobody like you. You can't obtain #t4031005# unless you're strong... If you really want it, prove me wrong and show me that you are worthy of it...
There's a huge cave in the middle of this island. In the deepest part of that cave live the mutants of Arcon. Take down those monsters and collect #b#e40 #t4000008#s#k#n. Are you brave enough?
That's right... A #b#t4000008##k looks like this #i4000008#. I'm doing this for a first-timer like you, so be thankful.
Hmmm... I may have underestimated you. Alright, here's the #t4031005#, since a promise is definitely a promise. Take it.
This bottle contains the blood of an Arcon I slayed... Hopefully you'll use it wisely, because it's a rare, precious item...
If you want to get the #t4031005# from me, you need to defeat monster in the underground tunnel and collect #b#e40 #t4000008#s#k#n. Until then, I can't give any #t4031005# to a nobody like you...
